description: Learn how to make soda bread with this recipe that features spiced buckwheat, rolled oats and sultanas. It's best served sliced and drizzled with honey.
name: Spiced Buckwheat & Oat Soda Bread Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Shape dough into a ball. Place on baking tray. Flatten to form a 15cm round. Score a cross into top of loaf. Brush with extra buttermilk. Dust with extra flour and sprinkle with buckwheat and reserved oats. Bake for 30 minutes or until browned and bread sounds hollow when tapped. Set aside for 10 minutes to cool slightly. Slice and serve with extra honey.
